attributes.action: Instigate a separate 'Charge of infringement of the human rights' of victims of criminal activities' and add it to the sentencing guidelines for Judges and Magistrates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it an offence to infringe the human rights of another, with a custodial sentence if found guilty.  This should be in addition to any other offence committed at the same time. (i.e. Burglary - sentence and then sentence for the 'Infringement of the human rights' of the victim)
